abstract: The chip giant is paying a roughly 60 percent premium for McAfee to expand its presence in security services.
snippet: The chip giant is paying a roughly 60 percent premium for McAfee to expand its presence in security services.
lead_paragraph: 5:02 p.m. | Updated  The New York Times’s Ashlee Vance provides more details on Intel’s deal for McAfee.

headline.main: Intel to Buy McAfee for $7.7 Billion
